title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.12 - Chair of the committee; secretary of committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.12 - Chair of the committee; secretary of committee

State Regulations

The chair shall appoint one member of a hospital
arbitration committee to serve as chair of the committee and shall also appoint
a secretary to such committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
